This upsets Bo, so they follow the crumb trail to GLORIOUS MR GRAPE'S GLORIOUS GRAPE MANSION and they will not stop until they gets their crackers. You have three days.

name: The Aching Aversion: Blood Orange Dreams
description:
The Aching Aversion: Blood Orange Dreams is a Surreal RPG Maker Horror game about exploring Rahma's disturbing dreams.

Unlike many games of this type, progress in Blood Orange Dreams is earned through killing NPCs in your dreams.

Made for Dream Diary Jam 8, Blood Orange Dreams is the second game from the Aching Aversion series.

name: Retale
description: You're in charge of the store this week! Stock and clean shelves, prevent thievery, satisfy customers, keep employees working their best and text your needy friend without your manager seeing! Lock in your time management skills in this fast-paced strategy game. Go through 7 shifts of restless retail work, and maybe you'll find yourself on the break room wall of fame.

name: Backrooms Brotherhood
description: Sin descripción

name: Shining Force: Horizons
description: What if you could choose the classes of force members as they joined? After some brainstorming, I figured it out and put together what became Horizons. I figured this would be something that would offer tons of enjoyment for those that have always wanted to choose classes for their team. To make this work, there is a limited cast, out of the 12 members, 9 are given the option of choosing a class upon joining.

name: Minesweeper Netflix
description: Run the numbers and reveal each square with care. Travel the world clearing undersea mines in this fresh spin on the classic logic puzzle game.

name: Where Kiwis
description: Search for 100 Kiwis. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 4
description:
Time to get ready for what's coming next, Festival-goers!

With Ubisoft Forward fast approaching, we wanted to thank you all for an amazing first year, your continued feedback, and for making The Crew Motorfest what it is today!

We have some exciting news to share with you next week, but before that, we wanted to give you a first look at what's coming for the end of Year 1:

Season 4 will be your next stop at Motorfest - and trust us, your customization skills will have to reach new heights as we kick off a brand-new playlist.

name: Outlanders 2: Second Nature
description:
Welcome back to the Outlands! A new, courageous generation of outlanders is ready to redefine life on the Outlands, with new aproaches to building and surviving, uncharted heights and horizons, and an ecosystem more vibrant than ever before.

Outlanders 2 is the latest installment of the charming town-builder that captivated players with its imaginative levels, easy-to-understand but hard-to-master gameplay, and offbeat humor.

name: "Comrades, We Have a Mole Problem."
description: "Hear me comrade, lives are at stake here. You are to take matters into your own hands, saving yourself and your comrades from spies from the West. The party appreciates your work, but don't forget, the party will not forgive incompetence."

name: Rogue Bot Adventure
description: Rogue Bot Adventure is an on-rails 3D platformer. Your goal is to collect the 10 parts of your ship and escape the enemies and hazards of this mysterious planet, including robots, lasers, acid, meteors, and more. Jump, slash, and reflect using your ancient artifact.

name: Life as a Lich
description: Embrace lichdom: research powerful spells, recruit undead legions, manage your domains, rule the underworld, and become a demigod!

name: Mad World Survivors
description: Mad World Survivors is a casual Vampire Survivors Like game in the style of cyber-post-apocalyptic horror with elements of a simplified roguelike. Here, every decision you make can cause an avalanche of consequences for the hordes of monsters you will face.

name: Shimotsuke no Yakata
description: Sin descripción

name: Lifeforms: Binary Fission
description: Clone yourself to take over the environment in this bacterial evolution roguelite. Choose mutations and abilities each time you multiply and unlock new morphologies and environments. Compete against other evolving species in survival mode and experiment with unlocked abilities in sandbox mode.

name: Ancient Sacrifice
description: A card battle game with a tealtime + deck building system. In a world where humans are turned into cards, players fight through the story of their revenge against the empire with cards.

name: Maze / Break
description: Gather your team, arm them with some gear and try to find the way out through the hordes of monsters in a procedurally generated maze!

name: Parkitect: Deluxe Edition
description: Parkitect Deluxe is the best way to get Parkitect! It contains: The base game. The Taste of Adventure DLC, with 10 levels, new rides and new themes! The Booms & Blooms DLC, with the effect sequencer, fireworks, and more new rides and decorations!

name: AfterM.A.T.H.
description: "AfterM.A.T.H. (Mobile Arsenal Tactical Hunter)" is a sci-fi action game where players pilot advanced mechs to combat the deadly Venomarch creatures. Engage in diverse missions including enemy elimination, hive destruction, new weapon testing, and giant boss battles in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train: NS Heritage Loco Bundle 1
description: The Evolution Series is a line of diesel locomotives built by GE Transportation Systems, initially designed to meet the U.S. EPA's Tier 2 locomotive emissions standards that took effect in 2005. This dlc features the ES44AC in five Norfolk Southern Heritage liveries.

name: Steel Warrior
description: Evil company Morning shift studios army has captured Steel warrior birthday cake. Steel warrior need revenge for his army and find all 6 cakes

description: Dive deep into a vibrant underwater world in Aquatic Life: Fish Simulator RPG! Embark on an epic adventure as a small fish with a big destiny. Explore stunning coral reefs, vast oceans, and winding rivers as you evolve into a powerful and majestic creature.

name: Platform Control
description: In Platform Control you can control both your player character and the platforms he has to jump on to get to the trophy and complete the level. Unlock more and more unique platforms as you progress through the levels and sharpen your problem solving skills!

The Scania 40 S and 45 S BEV, which are both based on the Scania S with a 4x2 chassis, feature two powertrain options, a 6-speed transmission combined with 3 electric motors with a power output of 400/450 kW. For now only as Quick Jobs trucks.

description: Unleash Your Inner Warrior in a Fast-Paced Top-Down 2D PvP Extravaganza! Strategy meets skill in intense player-versus-player combat! Master your hero, outsmart your opponents, and rise to the top in this vibrant, action-packed battleground.

description: Voyager EP is a single-player/co-op WAD containing five adventurous, space-themed maps, offering a wide range of gameplay experiences ranging from fierce action to gentle exploration. Each map took direct inspiration from one of the five tracks featured on Tristan Clark's Voyager EP, released in 2021. This mapset was created to show our appreciation for @Tristan and his extremely respectable body of work, musical and otherwise, and additionally to commemorate his 27th birthday this July!

Cold Shuulathoi is an unofficial mod for Doom II.

Doomguy is sent to an Arctic part of Mars to stop the summoning of a demon called the Shuulathoi. The base looks gothic, and some monsters have taken it over.

description: Korn Kachakon, a high school student, finds a painting of an ancient emperor at an art gallery. Unfortunately, a guard knocks him unconscious, and his spirit is whisked to the realm of "Pralai," where he's tasked with changing an ancient kingdom's fate.

name: XDefiant: Season 1 - GSK
description: Sin descripción

name: PowerWash Simulator: Alice's Adventures Special Pack
description: Take a trip down the rabbit hole to uncover a topsy-turvy, swizzy, whirly world of psychedelic colours, maximalist décor and larger-than-life locales. Clean up Wonderland in five fantastical new levels for PowerWash Simulator.

name: Permanence Break
description: A sci-fi first-person puzzle game based around object permanence. Move and look around rooms in order to pick which objects you see and which you don't.

name: Dunes of Valor
description: You will fight in an open field in the desert, switching to AI control depending on the situation.

name: Felon-E
description: Felon-E is an investigation game where players must infiltrate a secret robot sect, interact vocally with NPCs to collect clues, and gain the trust of the robotic priest Colbert Metalcreux to solve the mystery.

name: Beat the Fed
description: Run the Federal Reserve in this macroeconomics time-traveling simulation game. Apply monetary and fiscal policies and monitor and assess the impact on unemployment, inflation, and other key economic metrics. Can you Beat the Fed?

name: Echoes of the Emergent
description: In this Playdate-exclusive kinetic visual novel from the creators of Bloom, embark on a personal journey through a shattered post-apocalyptic world, where your pursuit for answers unveils the remnants of both a forgotten past and uncertain prospects for the future.

name: Gacha Fever
description: We are proud to show you our little game ! It is a vampire surviror like, but in a cute and colorful universe. You will fight waves of monsters with various weapons, from the machine gun to the magical girl wand !

name: Archery Red
description: Dive into a futuristic world as an archer, aiming to hit targets and vanquish robotic foes. Experience advanced mechanics and realistic shooting in an engaging single-player campaign or endless mode. Ready for the challenge?

name: Seraphim Slum
description: Befriend a girl, fall in love, and break them by awakening them. Teach them to go against their mental constraints, to fight back against their oppressors. Push them over the edge.

name: Baito Fight
description:
From the makers of HANA, comes a life sim JRPG for Playdate and PC about living in an apartment complex that's infested with monsters.

Use your sick baseball skills to exterminate monsters from your neighbors' apartments as a part-time devil hunter!!

Save up money for convenience store runs, and to pay off your overdue rent!!

CRANK to use the elevator and baseball bat!!

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail
description: Final Fantasy XIV: Dawntrail is the fifth expansion pack to Final Fantasy XIV Online. The expansion will bring an abundance of fresh content, including an increased level cap, multiple new jobs, sprawling new areas, new allied tribes, new dungeons, and new core battle content such as FATEs, Hunts, Treasure Hunts, and sidequests, and much more.

name: Chronicles Of Errodean
description: Embark on an epic adventure to collect three powerful relics in this medieval RPG. Explore ancient ruins, fight mythical beasts, and master magic to save the kingdom from an evil sorcerer.

name: Hot Blood
description: Take down zombies as a deadly cutie in 3D low-poly style! Hot Blood is physics-based brawling fun inspired by action movies of the 80s & 90s.

name: The First Descendant
description: Launched in July 2024, The First Descendant is a next-generation third-person co-op action RPG looter shooter featuring high-quality graphics developed using Unreal Engine 5. In the game, players become a Descendant whose mission is to combat against alien invaders – The Vulgus who crossed dimensions over 100 years ago and brought with them the devastating Colossi and destruction– for the survival of humanity and to protect Albion and the continent of Ingris. Players will encounter spectacular stories as they grow stronger through various missions and raids to finally discover the Descendants' secret. Cooperation is crucial as players team up with one another in strategic 4-player boss fights where teamwork and tactics are key. New equipment, materials, and items obtained through a myriad of missions and boss fights will contribute to players’ character development.

name: Arctic Anxiety
description: Survival simulator in extreme conditions. The game takes place in the Arctic ocean. The pilot of a cargo plane makes a hard landing on the water. To survive, the player will have to search for a cargo washed up on the shore.

name: Pokemon RBGenesis+
description: Re-experience Kanto in an all new light! Pokémon RBGenesis aims to recreate the feeling of playing Pokémon Red and Blue on your Gameboy for the first time. Using the colorful art style of the Gen 2 GSC games; Pokémon from gens 1-8, And all new events and characters, Kanto will feel nostalgic and fresh at the same time! RBG ups the expected difficulty of the Kanto region to bring a new challenge to returning players. Search the region for new wild Pokémon encounters based on the Day/Night cycle, or for the various Mega Stones and battle items scattered across the region! Discover all new areas, such as the River Valley, Deep Forest, or Mt. Moon Summit! Become the Champion of the Kanto region in a brand new way, and explore all new mysteries!

name: Ticking Tea Time
description:
A catastrophic bomb is rumored to have been planted by a notorious spy from the West. According to an inside source, the spy fled the scene aboard first-class cabin of Hesperia Express. As Eastside's top detective, you must go undercover as a train waiter to solve this mystery. Serve afternoon tea to investigate suspect passengers, all while a bomb ticks down and a national catastrophe looms.

Can you make the spy spill the tea?Serve up your investigation in Ticking Tea Time!

name: Survive the Squids
description: The Squids are here - but your soldiers are ready. Grow your squad up to 4 members by rescuing survivors. Obtain the best weapons, support, and equipment you can by gathering Squid Samples. Become a force to be reckoned with, one the Squids will fear for generations to come.

name: Cast or Pass
description: Battle your friends in a real time card game where wizards sling spells at each other. Has a unique spot as something in between a card game and a fighting game. Games usually take 1-5 minutes, depending on the characters that get picked.

name: Thing & Fist
description: Team up with a friend and play as either the artful wizard Thing or the stalwart golem Fist to pull off the heist of the century in this couch co-op top-down brawler!

name: UOGamers
description:
UOGamers is a unique flavor of Ultima Online brought to you by UOGamers and the developers of RunUO. It is a mix of classical and modern Ultima Online, based on the game in its PvP glory days. The shard features only the Felucca facet, where combat is unrestricted in most parts of Britannia. Additionally, factions, guild wars, the dueling system and regular tournaments held by staff.

Custom dungeons and special monsters throughout the world provide a challenging PvE experience. Customized housing is also available to provide for creative players who wish to build their own place in the world. If crafting is more your thing, then you will enjoy the all-custom, balanced, bulk order reward system, offering power scrolls to further enhance your skills.

UOGamers is backed up by a massive community ready to help and make your game experience better.

Features of Hybrid:

Skill cap of 700
Stats cap of 225
Fast skill gain
Felucca only
Factions, Hero/Evil system, Order/Chaos
Dueling system
Poker
New guild system
Customizable houses
Greater dungeon monsters
Paragons (Mobs of the Month)
Extensive rare item economy
Active in-game staff
Rift System
Regular PvP-themed events

We hope you enjoy your stay here, and thanks for considering UOGamers for your best in class gaming experience.

name: Silent Breach
description: A short cosmic horror game where you remotely operate a land rover through an unknown planet labeled the silent zone.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: Robots by datGestruepp
description: Get 20 beautifull traditionally hand drawn Robot paintings from datGestruepp to puzzle.

name: Warno: Reinforcement Pack #1
description: Expand WARNO's battlefields for free with the Reinforcement Pack #1, bringing a massive brand-new built-up battlefield, Urban Frontlines. Inspired by the “railway” city of Lehrte in West Germany, the large-scale built-up map is one of the biggest WARNO has seen.

name: Melly the Naughty Dog
description: Melly the Naughty Dog is a short, funny point-and-click puzzle game with hand-drawn and digital art. Play as Melly, navigating his dream world, solving puzzles, and meeting characters like the fairy dog and the knight to reclaim his jug and return home.

name: Gates of Despair
description: Gates of Despair is a captivating single-player survival horror game with multiple chapters. Experience randomized gameplay, creepy jumpscares and terrifying enemies. Uncover the captivating story through cutscenes and master a variety of challenges. Are you brave enough?

name: Angel Legion: Shadow Woven - Blue
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Thor's Breakout
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling Breakout adventure with 20 unique levels that challenge your reflexes, strategy, and endurance. Each level is meticulously designed and features creative obstacles that provide hours of fun. Are you ready to take on the challenge and master every surprise?

name: Finishline
description: A driving simulator that helps you reconsider your life choices

name: Eternal Cocoon
description: Eternal Cocoon is a horror adventure game centered around Olivia, a girl whose boundaries between reality and dreams are blurred. Olivia must choose her own destiny while avoiding danger and an onslaught of monsters to uncover her truth.

name: Midnight's Bell
description: Follow Midnight, a black cat who remains loyal to his owner even in death, as he travels across Heaven and into dreams to find out what's going on with his old owner, Mary.

name: Gaiadon: Eternal Quest
description: An idle/incremental RPG

name: Kute Knight
description: A platform game where you control a knight who must collect coins and defeat monsters.

name: Animal Company

name: Yo! Noid 4: Episode 3
description:
The Noid is back in the long-awaited final episode of Yo Noid 4.

The Noid, and his Sidekick Pepe the Pepperoni, journey to Pepe's home planet: The Domino's Pizza Planet, to save it from enslavement from an insane Hatsune Miku who is threatening to put pineapple on every pizza.

This game is pulled from a world where Domino's Pizza's mascot "The Noid" became the hit platforming sensation rather than Sonic the Hedgehog. Including having Yo! Noid 4 having it's third episode released!

name: Duskfall
description: Embark on a thrilling journey with this turn-based dungeon crawler RPG! Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Duskfall. Dive into the heart of dungeons, where every step holds secrets, treasures, and formidable foes.

It's open source, so anyone can use parts of it for their own mods, or create their own derivatives.

Step into "The Paradogx Incident," where puzzle-platforming meets rhythmic precision. Guide Dox the dog through mind-twisting, recursive puzzles in a dynamic, beat-driven world and rhythm levels.

Enjoy full controller support and an adaptive soundtrack that changes with every dimension.

Experience a unique blend of genres in this innovative adventure!

In this game, you must compete against other players (goobers) to complete the match objective. There are multiple possible modes, such as 'Balloon Pop' and 'Deathmatch.' Be the first to get 5 points to win, and even earn cosmetics.

Play in 4 different arenas, collect rare rewards, and dominate the Sanctuary!

name: Cubric
description:
Ready to enter a world where creativity knows no bounds? Where every block offers access to fresh adventures, mini games and challenging puzzles? Tired of traditional, multiplayer, open world games and want a new challenge? Then you’re ready for Cubric!

Cubric is the ultimate 3D world builder game that promises endless possibilities and tons of fun! Whether you're new to gaming or a seasoned explorer, Cubric offers awesome for everyone. Craft your own avatar, build towering structures, and dive into exhilarating competitions and puzzles. Discover why Cubric is the next big thing in mobile simulation and adventure gaming!

name: Hopeless Divine: Wake of Vultures
description:
"I'll never forget the day my father died."

The world is ending and she couldn't be more alone.

Discover the truth behind Hel and her family as she steps into the sad lives of the Vulture's Kettle.

Sadness, hatred, violence: these grease the gears of the dying world.

The party has ended.

Orion & Artemis, an odd pair consisting of a large cyborg and her still-human friend, go home together after a pleasant night out. Orion is wrapped around Artemis’s little finger once again. But what happens when she’s wound too tight?

SATISFACTION DRONE is a short & messy kinetic story with uncomfortable friends-with-benefits lesbianism and semiviolent robot sex. Adults only!

name: ESP: ExtraSensitive Pervert

Blessed with powerful extrasensory abilities, a gross girl spends all day arguing with strangers on the internet about anime and eating junk food. Has she finally caught her lucky break when a beautiful girl she's never seen before comes knocking at her door? Find out how this easily excitable pervert handles this unusual development in her otherwise monotonous life.

An erotic kinetic visual novel, ~15k words in length.

name: LetterSchmetter
description:
LetterSchmetter is a new browser game, which is currently still in closed beta. In this game you have to form words from an anagram in German. The individual letters bring different points, whereby the rounds become more difficult after each solved turn. The game is available for Twitch and is intended as a community game, since the entire chat is involved.
In addition, undiscovered words are displayed, so that there is also a learning effect here.

The name "LetterSchmetter" is a mixture of the English word "Letter" and the German word "Schmetter" (means to bounce something at high speed on a surface).

At the moment 25 german streamers are involved and test all functions live in their streams.
If the Beta finished, the german community have a new game.

After the released were planned to run the game in english, spanish and french language after a short period of release time.

Are you ready to dive into peak 'multimedia'? With TIME magazine's '1993 product of the year'? Wanna play with the... 3DO?! After just releasing There Is Hope for the Atari Jaguar this year, Remute goes even more niche and already comes up with his next interactive music album Remute 3D exclusively for the 3DO.

Remute 3D contains 15 brand new tracks ranging from psychedelic techno trance bliss to adventurous, spaced-out new wave electro-pop. It is showcasing once more Remute's versatility and lust for experimenting while staying true to his 90s electronica and rave roots. Meet Remute in a realtime 3D-environment, watch full motion video, play a game or just simply listen to some tunes - yes, this is multimedia in full effect!

Create your own live music using musical instruments. Sing using real microphone in karaoke mode. Become a worldwide known musician.

name: Hentai Solitaire
description: Pull an ace out of your pocket and check what challenges await you!

name: Grandma Cleaning Simulator: Family Business Tycoon
description: Clean, Build, Prosper: Sweep Your Way to Success and Family Fortune!

name: East Wood Carnival
description: A PSX retro horror game made by a sixth grader. Your car runs out of gas on your way to an abandoned carnival now infested with danger at every corner.

name: Cthulhu Mythos ADV The Isle Of Ubohoth
description: A horror dice roll adventure inspired by the Cthulhu Mythos. Much like in a tabletop RPG, "abilities," "luck," and "dice rolls" influence the story's progression. The protagonist is cursed on an island in the Seto Inland Sea. Investigate the island, uncover the mysteries, and break the curse!

name: Multiplayer Survivors
description: MULTIPLAYER SURVIVORS - a highly advanced multiplayer and single player RPG survival looter shooter game, packed with lots of great maps to explore.

name: Find Cats2
description: "This is a cute game for finding foodie kittens!" A few maps and a chance to find the furry creatures that are cleverly hiding!"

name: Supermarket Simulator Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: Offroad Masters: Motocross Races
description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure with Offroad Masters: Motocross Races!

name: Hamster
description: Hamster is an idle clicker game in which you click a Hamster to make him shiver. Each click has a random chance to make him shake a little more, or a little less. Can you make him go crazy?

name: Loud Run
description: "Loud Run" is a 2-12 player fun multiplayer game. The Chaser tries to catch all the Runners within the range of their voice. When the Chaser runs out of breath, it's the Runners' turn to take down the Chaser. Prepare your breath; a looooong adventure awaits you!

name: If you touch me, I will marry you.
description: “If you touch me, I will marry you.” is an escape room tag game where you can move your character to avoid obstacles and enjoy mini games.

name: Purple Prose for Purple Hearts: **** the Witch
description:
Meet Lucia. You're probably wondering how she-

okay, okay - you're probably not wondering that. She certainly is though; she tends to do it far too much. Today, she's had a funny idea: it includes, among other things, capturing a person in a pretty consensual, laidback, entirely safe manner to have a drawn out conversation about, like...God, the moral bankruptcy of 1900s psychological studies...anime maybe?

If that sounds trite on its face, well, perhaps it is. What ensues though is an event unheard of on the Last World, the world located most closely to the end of the universe and the last one we are ever likely to get in this lifetime. It is a leisurely trip through a maze with jagged edges. It becomes a commentary upon commentary as commentators gather to gawk and speculate about a series of events no one can really firmly understand.

And what the hey: you stick around after the end, we got romance, thrills, chills, and things it would be impolitic to talk about as a lead-in to an adventure through comforting environs with a witch and her agenda.

name: Nightmare Fuel
description: Elvira has violated her mother's main injunction 'not to mix alcohol with drugs' and is about to die at the underground techno rave. Well-built Pink Rabbit appears unexpectedly and makes a strange proposal (refusal is not accepted). Now, the girl must save the Pink Kingdom, taste cucumber pizza and, who knows, deal with the cockroaches in her mind.

name: Gen.loss
description:
A Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 8.

Control Yamitsuki as she wanders a melancholy dreamscape. Learn more about her past and deep-set fears.

name: Payday 3: Boys In Blue - Chapter 2
description:
Chapter 2 - Boys in Blue is the second DLC as part of the Silver & Gold editions.
This chapter contains:
The Boys in Blue Heist
The Boys in Blue Tailor Pack
The Boys in Blue Weapon Pack

What would you do if some corrupt cops raided your completely legitimate business, planted some evidence, and showed every sign of wanting to keep the gold they “confiscated”? Well, in Vlad’s case, he got in touch with his old friends in the Payday Gang to enact revenge and get his damn gold back.
The Boys in Blue Heist tasks the gang with breaking into a secure holding facility of the NYPD on Vlad’s behalf. He wants his gold back, and the gang has never let him down before.

name: A Burger in Space
description: Take on the role of Big B and pilot a unique spaceship in the shape of a burger through infinite space!

name: Ultimate Rock Climbing Challenge
description: Experience risk in truly wild conditions - become a rock climber !

name: Betty's Brawl
description: Sin descripción

name: Reimu Needs Help!? Aunn-chan to the Rescue!
description:
This is a Touhou Project fan game in which the player tries to help Hakurei Reimu, who is in trouble, with items completed in a slot.
The main character in this game is Komano Aun.

name: At Your Feet
description: Romance beautiful women with gorgeous feet

name: Trial of Sacrifice
description: A cult, devoted to the dark god, Chernobog, has opened a rift between the mortal world and Chernobog's realm, where he has been imprisoned for centuries. From within the rift, darkness spreads out and threatens to envelope the entire world.

name: Onslaught on the Solar Frontier
description: Take on the enemy onslaught in this top-down cover shooter roguelite.

name: Wicked Arcana
description: Step into the mystical world of 'Wicked Arcana, where ancient runes unlock powerful magic and hidden truths in this early access demo.

name: Lens Adventure
description: Lens Adventure is an action puzzle game where you play as Talia, a Magic Academy graduate student. Use the camera's time-space magic to solve puzzles: create platforms by photographing objects and use time magic to undo mistakes. Can you return to the academy before the dorm lights go out?

name: Air Sea Modern Conflict
description: Dive into the heart-pounding action of "Air Sea Modern Conflict," an exhilarating game where you take direct control of powerful ships and aircraft to annihilate waves of relentless enemies. As a skilled commander, you'll pilot various naval vessels, from agile destroyers and stealthy submarines to massive aircraft carriers, each armed with an array of devastating weapons. Take to the skies with an impressive selection of aircraft, including nimble fighters, heavy bombers, drones and versatile helicopters, to dominate both land and sea.

name: Dead for Dread
description: Dead for Dread is an exciting game in which you take on the role of a brave hero who goes into the dark labyrinths to retrieve a stolen artifact. Embark on a dangerous journey through mysterious dungeons full of mysteries and sinister creatures.

name: Resonating Worlds
description: Resonating Worlds is a Turn-based strategy game, with a lot of Character customization and progression. Mysterious towers have appeared in the world of Atuhm. These towers are a connection between worlds. But the towers bear a dark secret, that waits to be uncovered...

name: Yori's Journey: Forgotten Origins
description: Unleash your skills and face your foes, go to the end and survive the experiment.

name: Lamplight
description: Lamplight is a 3D mind-bending puzzle platformer where you defy gravity and warp your perception. Navigate a labyrinth of rooms where walls become floors, ceilings become pathways, and time bends unexpectedly. Unravel the secrets hidden within this distorted world - are you ready to be challenged?

name: Trilingual
description: Welcome to the planet, Triangulus. Can you solve the hidden mysteries of each island and escape with your brain intact? Scan these ancient runes to decode a new alien language. Use this alien language to grow plants, move trains, and even save the Trilings of the planet.

name: Lukewarm Massacre: The Spirit of Light
description: Lukewarm Massacre: The Spirit of Light tells a comedy-horror adventure of three forest spirits. Join them in finding their kidnapped friend!

name: Chess Club Valley
description: Chess Club Valley is a 2D Open-World Chess RPG. Experience this epic chess adventure for the first time across a world filled with unique character’s, monsters, secrets and super bosses, while playing chess to level up your XP. A total of 20+ hours of gameplay!

name: Cryptic Route
description: "Cryptic Route" begins with the protagonist driving through a rainy night forest. Relying on navigation, each choice influences the outcome of the journey. The multiple ending system offers various results, immersing players into a tale of mystery and horror.

name: Blenderman
description: Blender would love to have you for dinner. Dinner is served at 6 o' clock. You have until then to escape.

name: Set Sail! Arena
description: Set Sail! Arena is a 4v4 PVP Arena Action game. Face off against your friends as Pirates or British, across unique maps and modes. Customise your character and fight with swords, pistols and a variety of Power Weapons!

name: Sea of Change
description: Sea of Change is a game that blends exploration with strategic base defense. Build, defend, and expand your base against waves of enemies, all while uncovering the mysteries of a dynamic world that shifts with every playthrough. Set sail to find islands and collect resources. How long can you last?

name: Unclogged
description: Unclogged is a puzzle horror escape game. Collect items, solve puzzles, unclog the toilet, and hopefully make an escape.

name: ScarQuest
description: Raise armies to dominate, seize, and reign over the planet as its ruler.

name: Mayonaka 10 Chome
description: Currently, in the town of Mayonaka, abnormal phenomena and terrifying apparitions have been witnessed. If you encounter them, never approach,Please turn left at this road. If there are no abnormalities, please turn right. Will you be able to safely navigate through the eternal road of terror?

name: Gigantosaurus Dino Sports
description: On your marks for a roar-some sports party for one to four dinos. These eight chomp-sized games are enormous fun – but watch out for Giganto!

name: 34 Sports Games: World Edition
description: 34 Sports Games – World Edition is the ultimate game that brings together 34 different sports in one game!

name: Stack Surge
description: Stack Surge is a vibrant 3D physics-based block stacking puzzle game, offering players a relaxing yet challenging experience. Test your stacking skills, build towering structures, and navigate through obstacles in this addictive adventure.

name: The Wicked West
description: A Low-Poly Western-themed FPS that can be played alone or with with up to 6 friends! Wield iconic weapons like the revolver, lever-action rifle, shotgun, and sniper all while relying on strategy, quick reflexes, and steady aim to outduel your friends!

name: Redlight
description: Redlight is a chilling multiplayer first-person horror experience. Traverse a liminal maze alongside friends while being hunted by a relentless AI-driven terror lurking in the shadows. Work together to activate generators, but remember: survival demands stealth when the lights turn red.

name: Virus 3D
description: Eradicate the logic viruses infecting your android baby sister in order to save her life in this fast-paced twin-stick shooter.

name: Bokkie
description: Dare to enter the world of "BOKKIE" where the line between childhood innocence and supernatural terror is blurred, and every corner hides a secret waiting to be unveiled. Will you brave the haunting whispers of the abandoned toys, or succumb to the darkness that lurks within?

name: Naraku
description: This is a survival horror action game in which a young girl "Enri" tries to escape from a mysterious facility filled with blood and madness.

name: Be Silent
description: You got trapped in a garden by something. In order to escape you have to find hints and items - but be silent, something is listening...

name: Sea of Stars: Early Backer Limited Edition
description:
Comes with an exclusive booklet, available only for early Kickstarter backers.

Sea of Stars is a turn-based RPG inspired by the classics. Promising the Sabotage touch in every system, Sea of Stars aims to modernize the classic RPG in terms of turn-based combat, storytelling, exploration and interactions with the environment, while still offering a hearty slice of nostalgia and good old, simple fun.

Early Backer Limited Edition includes:
- Sea of Stars physical edition
- Acrylic Standee
- Silver Enamel Pin
- Original Soundtrack 2-Disc Digipak
- 12"x16" Poster
- Instruction Booklet

name: Idiots' Fantasy
description: Idiot's Fantasy is an idiotic hack-slash Roguelike in a world where every rule can be changed by equipping various rule books. Fight, explore, buy, switch, and die as you conquer this randomly generated world using the idiotic gameplay you've created yourself.

name: Aimcademy
description: Aimcademy is a science-based aim trainer. The combination of sport science and gaming leads to the most efficient way of training in gaming. Unleash your true potential!

name: Young Hearts
description: ‘Young Hearts' is a visual novel in the genres of romance and slice of life, telling stories about the everyday life of a student company living in a warm southern town: stories about their secrets, dreams, love, their problems and ghosts of the past…

name: Night Poetry
description: Night Poetry is a rogue-lite, story-driven, RPG game, where your choices matter! Survive in your own manner and witness the game's response to your actions, whether it's fighting your way out or coming up with something to bewilder your enemies, as you explore this mysterious world...

name: Disciples of Varahces
description: Disciples of Varahces is a roguelike where you fight waves of increasingly stronger enemies, gathering items along the way to grow stronger yourself.

name: KoroNeko
description: Relaxing puzzle game, roll your way in a Kawaii world full of Charming characters, a calming journey ahead of you to save your siblings from Strawberry the witch.

name: Garage Sale
description: It's garage sale day! Embark on a small scavenger hunt throughout Lettuce Village's community-wide garage sale. In this story exploration game, you'll collect items with strange backstories, help your quirky neighbors, and maybe even uncover some of the town's secrets... Coming soon!

name: Nocturnal Visitors
description: Investigate morally grey crimes in this fantasy thriller in where magic and science, chaos and order, are two sides of the same coin.

name: Legends of Crystal
description: Legends of Crystal is a turn-based RPG that blends two cultures, namely Nusantara and Japan. It tells the story of a child chosen by a god who must save a crystal from evil. The crystal is divided into 6 powers due to the greed of jinns and mythical creatures in the past.

name: Outbrk
description: Storm Chasing Simulator

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Tracker - Slappy
description: As a Dark Jester, more than just laughter is needed to satisfy this Klown. Nothing is more funny to Slappy than the sounds of humans fleeing in terror. Slappy is a special character skin for the Tracker Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Human Summer Outfit Pack
description: The sun is out, and the beaches of Crescent Cove are brimming with energy! Gear up for the Klown invasion with this assortment of summer themed human cosmetics! This DLC includes summer themed tops, bottoms, hats, and eyewear. All items are purely cosmetic and do not alter gameplay.

name: Barro T23: Pack #2
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Barro GT: Pack #2
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Barro F22: Pack #2
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Myth of Empires: Hellenic Civilization Pack
description: As the first new civilization DLC for Myth of Empires, the Hellenic Civilization Pack contains 12 new armor sets, 15 special weapons, a full set of new building recipes, 1 warship, 6 musical instruments, and 5 building platforms, adding a whole new dimension to the game!

name: The Witch of Fern Island: Spooky Witch Pack
description: Spooky Witch Pack is a unique DLC for The Witch of Fern Island that will transport you into a world of dark mysteries and eerie adventures! Infuse your game with an atmosphere full of horror and magic. Feel a thrilling chill!

name: Ghostrunner II: Heat Pack
description: Experience the searing intensity of Ghostrunner 2 with the third cosmetic DLC, the Heat Pack! Ignite your gameplay experience with three heat-themed katanas and a sizzling motorcycle design as you battle through Dharma Tower and the sun-soaked wastelands.

name: Creepy Waves FM: Bugs Fixer
description: A young and promising boy applies for a job at a AAA game development company. As he starts working night shifts on probation, he experiences a series of events that could lead to no good. As the story unfolds, you will be able to choose what you would do in his place.

name: Moonstone Island: Pool Party DLC Pack
description: Our scientists at Moonstone Island Inc. have been hard at work creating our next FREE cosmetic DLC: Pool Party!

name: Where is the Tutorial
description: Where is the Tutorial is a game where the biggest challenge is simply figuring out how to play. Dropped into a whimsical world with no instructions, no hints, and no mercy, you're left to navigate a series of increasingly bizarre levels using only your wits and a growing sense of frustration.

name: Sker Ritual: Skerville Slasher
description: Run and Hide! It's the Skerville Slasher, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Let's School: Magical Castles Furniture Pack
description: We may live in a world without magic, but this new set of fantasy furniture combos will fulfill the dreams for those who grew up with the stories of the fantasy world.

name: Gambit Shifter: Surrealm
description: Surrealm is a DLC for Gambit Shifter, providing a whole new set of levels that will challenge both your skill and creativity.

name: Cellyon: Boss Maker
description: Cellyon: Boss Maker gives you the possibility to invent from A to Z the class which the players will use for your fight.

name: PAWG Runner: A NSFW Platformer
description: Race against the clock with epic anime babes, unlocking bold outfits and NSFW options. Take on tough levels and dive into hilarious mini-games. Think you can conquer the challenges and uncover all the secrets?

name: Synthetic Soul: Onyx
description: Synthetic Soul: Onyx is an immersive futuristic life sim with an in-depth robot companion. Discover the future and restore the past.

name: Heretic's Fork: The Savior's Descent
description: Heretic's Fork: The Savior's Descent update includes: Endless Mode Optimization; Torment Modifiers; Japanese Localization; Continue Shift to Endless Mode; Full Controller Support and New Music:

name: Warp Speed: Infinity
description: Put your reflexes to the ultimate test with this unique arcade-style racing game: Warp speed: Infinity. Make your way through space at incredible speeds while dodging asteroids and space junk. Unlock a variety of different ships with unique features and handling by reaching ever higher scores.

name: TeleMorpher
description: "Telemorpher" is a high-tech weapon that can shoot teleportation spheres. With it, you can teleport to the sphere's location. Your sole objective is to use this gun to escape from the mysterious laboratory!

name: Candy Golf
description: Minigolf game. 3 different levels with totally 42 holes. Play alone or against bots

name: Seekers of Darkness
description: Dive into "Seekers of Darkness," a thrilling deck-building roguelike RPG with intense card battles and tower defense RTS elements. Unlock powerful characters, build unique strategies with over 70 cards, and compete in offline rankings. Burn enemies, freeze them, or overpower with weapons. Enjoy!!

name: Anomalia O Despertar
description: Titan Tech was a factory known for creating machines that advanced humanity, but it was suddenly shut down with the disappearance of several employees. When you wake up you will come across machines that will try to catch you, Be smart and survive, death will be the least of your worries.

name: True Love
description: If you are looking for the True Love... Here you go xd

name: Golf In Wonderland
description: Dive into a fantastical adventure where sport and fantasy come together in a world as delirious as it is enchanting. Welcome to "Golf in Wonderland," a unique golf game that transports you to the heart of the wonderland.

name: Crimson Thread of Fate
description: It's almost time for your reincarnation! With the help of Moira, enter the path of reincarnation and meet certain someone there. Hey, maybe he will be your soulmate in your next life. Who knows? You decide!

name: Neptunia Riders vs. Dogoos
description: Neptunia Riders vs Dogoos is a bike action game in the Hyperdimension Neptunia series. This game follows Uzume and the four Goddesses on motorcycles in a fight against the Dogoo army and collecting them.

name: Stair Tower
description: This is a vertical platform game: climb the terrible tower and reach the top to make your wish come true. More than 16 horizontal levels medium-high difficulty Variety of settings

name: My Special Summer Vacation 2
description: Boku has been sent to live with his aunt over the course of his summer vacation. The small town where she lives may be out in the sticks, but it still has a number of interesting characters to meet and play with, and plenty of activities for a young man to enjoy!

name: Churip
description: "CHURIP" is a horror adventure game set in modern times. On the day of the funeral, her casket was beautifully adorned with many flowers. She often appears in my dreams as she was when she was alive.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - To Danse with the Veiled Horde
description: Gather up to three fellow souls and delve into four maps "Main Street", "South Park Elementary," “Town Square,” and beyond.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Nonconformist Weapon Variation Pack
description: Abandon the normy daggers and seize these malevolent Sickles. Drain the lifeblood of the unworthy and repurpose their essence to power the darkness within you. This reskin of the daggers comes with upgrade cards and macabre new cosmetics.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Bigger, Longer & Uncut Anniversary Pack
description: Celebrate 25 years of "South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut" with all-new cosmetics

name: Final Fantasy V-Pixel Freemaster
description: Final Fantasy V-Pixel Freemaster v5.88 is an Ultimate or Redux-like version of Final Fantasy V for the SNES. It is the culmination of many authors work and two years of many revisions, bugfixing, and playtesting efforts. It is a FFV fan’s answer to the Official Pixel Remaster. FFV-Pixel Freemaster comes in two varieties with a ton of new QOL improvements including innuberable bugfixes, a new game plus, visible job class sprites in map, MSU1 cd quality audio, super custom classes, amazing optional patches like a fixed 2x abp,xp,and gil or a no encounters mode that allows you to get into a random battle by pressing start and many more!

name: Candle Wood
description: A brutal and gorgeous hand-drawn 2D platformer in a world of candle folks!

name: Payday 3: Gold Pass
description: The Payday 3 Gold Pass includes all four Year 1 Expansions - Syntax Error, Boys in Blue, Houston Breakout, and Fear and Greed - as well as some special bonus content.

name: Payday 3: Chapter 2 - Boys in Blue
description:
What would you do if some corrupt cops raided your completely legitimate business, planted some evidence, and showed every sign of wanting to keep the gold they “confiscated”? Well, in Vlad’s case, he got in touch with his old friends in the Payday Gang to enact revenge and get his damn gold back.
The Boys in Blue Heist tasks the gang with breaking into a secure holding facility of the NYPD on Vlad’s behalf. He wants his gold back, and the gang has never let him down before.

name: Rented Nightmare
description: Having a girlfriend who lives very far away is a challenge. After our car breaks down, we have to take a series of buses with many transfers to see her. Since the buses don't run at night, halfway through the trip we rent a cool looking trailer at a trailer park. Now we just need to survive the night...

name: Puzzle Scenery
description: This game is a classic memory game with multiple difficulty levels and beautiful graphics. In the game you have to go through 20 levels consisting of pictures of nature.

name: Urban
description: Urban is a horror game based on the Japanese legend of the 8-foot-tall spirit. Players explore an abandoned village haunted by Hachishaku-sama spirit, surviving encounters to uncover its dark secrets. Can you escape from Hachishaku-sama in Urban?

name: Zombi Efem
description: Join the battle for survival against zombies with "Zombi Efem"! Play solo or online with up to four players in both TPS and FPS modes. This horror survival game invites you to face challenging combats and thrilling moments. Plan your strategy, prepare your weapons, and fight to survive!

name: Zenith Armada
description: Embark on interstellar conquest in a 2D space strategy game. Command ships, explore galaxies, engage in real-time battles, and customize your fleet. Traverse hazardous star maps, unlock factions, and strategize for victory. Are you ready to conquer the cosmos?

name: Apprehending the Adventuer Chan!: Live2D Tentacles Simulator
description: A tentacle training simulator developed specifically for experienced players. Players will control tentacles to fully train the captured adventurer-chan. All animations are rendered in full Live2D, providing immediate feedback based on various actions to satisfy your desires for tentacle training!

name: Crymachina: Standard Uniform Set
description: A three-item set of school uniform costumes. Includes the following: ・Standard Uniform (Leben) ・Standard Uniform (Mikoto) ・Standard Uniform (Ami)

name: Crymachina: Trinity Set
description: A set of Trinity-centric content. Allows the following to be controlled as playable characters: ・Hayat ・Vida ・Can

name: Payday 3: Boys in Blue Tailor Pack
description: The Boys in Blue Tailor Pack puts you in the literal shoes of both criminals and law enforcement. Also available as part of the Boys in Blue Chapter 2 Bundle.

name: Payday 3: Boys in Blue Heist
description: The Boys in Blue Heist takes you to a New York City police station to steal back valuables falsely confiscated by corrupt police officers.

name: Payday 3: Boys in Blue Weapon Pack
description: The Boys in Blue Weapon Pack contains three powerful new weapons brimming with mods to even out the heister's arsenal. Also available as part of the Boys in Blue Chapter 2 Bundle.

name: Campgrounds Adventures
description: Campgrounds Adventures: The Big Oopsie is a captivating time management and strategy game where you build and manage thriving campsites. ️ Balance tasks, develop strategies, and progress through levels filled with lush landscapes and bustling campsites. Dive in and start your adventure today!

name: Jusou: Gakkou no Kaidan
description: THE JUSOU Series, known as the scariest smartphone escape game ever, is finally available on Steam! A steady stream of people have given up on completing the game because it was too scary! Extremely horror and scares have caused the horror infection to spread in X (Twitter) and live videos!

name: Backrooms: Maintenance
description: Welcome to the back office company. I am your manager, Carl. Please complete the task assigned by your superiors. Oh, by the way, be careful, any possible loss will cause damage to the company's property.

name: Coach Bus Driving Simulator: Comfort Long Road Vehicle
description: Sin descripción

name: Coach Bus Driving Simulator: Fast Long Road Vehicle
description: Sin descripción

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories - Thrilling Outfit Pack
description: This is an outfit set for Loid, Anya, Yor, and Bond to use in SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories.

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories - Excited Outifit Pack
description: This is an outfit set for Loid, Anya, Yor, and Bond to use in SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories.

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories - Deluxe Outing Pack
description: The Deluxe Outing Pack is a bundle that combines the Thrilling Outfit Pack, Excited Outfit Pack, and Deluxe Outing Pack Bonus.

name: Coach Bus Driving Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Cats Baseball
description:
A baseball game where the outcome is decided by dice.
Even if you don't know the rules of baseball, anyone can enjoy it easily!

name: Arcade Archives: Jackal
description:
"JACKAL" is an action game released by KONAMI in 1986.
"Jackal" is a special force that can survive under any conditions.
Control them and drive your armored vehicle into the heart of enemy territory to rescue prisoners.

name: Cheating Reset: Uwaki Reset
description: A happy life of living together. I thought it was going well all this time. Let's start over. Let's go back to six months ago...

name: Lady & Lonely Boy: Ojou-sama to Bocchi-kun
description: Enrolling in an all-girls school as the only boy!?A harem academy life where I'm at the mercy of a young lady with almost no knowledge of men is about to begin...!

name: Hole Theory
description: Eat everything

name: Factory Parking
description: A Doom-style map (more abstract and less realistic, among other things) that takes place in some parking lots/garages that have been invaded by the aliens.

name: Stone Flower
description: Five Boom-compatible maps based around an earthy, green-and-brown texture theme, and design mostly inspired by Ribbiks' earlier work. Starts with tiny sandbox maps in MAP01 and 02, ramps up the difficulty with combat﻿-puzzle stuff in MAP03 and 04 and builds up to a slaughter finale in MAP05.

name: Plutonic Visions
description: Plutonic Visions is a 22 map wad for The Plutonia Experiment. Features mostly very short, action packed maps inspired by Plutonia's first two episodes, with some longer ones inspired by the final third sprinkled in for good measure.

name: Paint it Doom
description:
Paint it Doom is a conceptual successor to DIY, in that both are made out of solid colors. The sprites aren't crunched in this one though.

The wad is divided into 2 episodes:
Liberal Arts - which is a mainline progression consisting of 19 maps. Some of the later maps are pretty slaughtery.
Radicalized Arts - which is 3 misfit maps that couldn't be reconciled with my vision.

name: From The Mystery Zone
description: You find yourself in a pitch-dark world. Avoid dangerous events, restore memory, and escape from the “Mystery Zone”.

name: The Obligatory Undertale Yellow Sans fight
description: The Undertale Yellow Sans fight.

name: Hitman 3: The Disruptor Pack
description:
Unlock a series of cosmetics inspired by The Disruptor Elusive Target mission and gain permanent access to The Ostentatious - A two-level Arcade contract featuring The Disruptor Elusive Target.

Following Conor McGregor's conviction for sexually assaulting a woman in a hotel room, I/O Interactive decided to pull The Disruptor Pack from digital storefronts on November 25th, 2024.

name: Stray Gods: Orpheus
description: Play as Orpheus in this brand new story for Stray Gods: The Roleplaying Musical! Orpheus’ story is arguably finished - until Hermes brings him back to the world of the living. With their help, you’ll guide Orpheus through the depths of mortal decision making - who to date, what to hope for, what instrument to rock out on…

name: Glass Masquerade 3: Honeylines - Folks & Spirits
description: The "Folks & Spirits" puzzle set contains 10 new puzzles representing 2 new themes with 5 puzzles in each, respectively - FREE demo puzzles included!

name: Never Really Alone
description: A stressful day is not always saved by a good night's sleep. A girl alone in her new foster home finds any excuse not to go to bed. A short horror RPG made for an alternative game development class at the University of Utah.

name: Yume Nikki Ware
description: WarioWare, but it's Yume Nikki!

name: DJMax Respect V: V Liberty Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - V LIBERTY PACK!! Meet the 'V Original Music' package now!

name: DNA Subject: Lucy
description: DNA Subject: Lucy is a Yume Nikki fangame where you explore the dreams of Lucy, a young girl who isolates herself from the rest of the world. An entry for Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Cave Digger 2: Mixed Reality Expansion
description: Sin descripción

name: Radikal Fighters
description:
Radikal Fighters is an exciting action game with vibrant, cartoonish visuals, that offers two thrilling game modes:

Battle Royale: Dive into a chaotic free-for-all where only the last fighter standing wins. Explore the vibrant streets of Radikal City, filled with surprises and hazards. Use your unique perks, weapons, and gear to outsmart and outfight other players in fast-paced, intense battles.

Paint Rush: Engage in an exhilarating team-based mode where three teams compete to dominate the arena by coloring as many dots as possible in their team's colors. Collaborate with your teammates, strategize to cover the most ground, and thwart your opponents' efforts in this fast-paced, color-splattered frenzy.

Get ready to jump into the action and prove your skills in the absurd world of Radikal Fighters!

name: Kingdom's Dungeon Rage
description: The king have been taken hostage and locked inside a Dungeon! A dungeon that changes each time you die or complete a level. Complete in challenging different ways to escape, from becoming invisible, turning the world upside down and a lot more - your only goal is to escape without rage quitting.

name: Ultra Hard! Spot the Difference Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Make it! Yakitori
description:
It's time to cook a street food staple: yakitori!
Grill them with sauce, grill them with salt, and make all sorts of popular yakitori styles!

name: Mega Ramp Car Jumping
description: Ski-jumping - in a car - over city skylines and through clouds? What could go wrong?

name: Merge Block Puzzle
description:
Move the blocks with the same number to fuse them together.
As time goes by, the blocks will be added to the game, so

name: Synaxarion: Great Martyr Theodore the Tyro
description: Holy Great Martyr Theodore the Tyro (or Theodore the Recruit) lived in the early 300s. This Synaxarion will step through his story as it is known today.

name: Shogun
description: Carve your legacy in a world of samurais, where strategy, prosperity, and heritage converge.

name: Eggconsole Topple Zip PC-8801
description: Ride the Zippin and join the race on Frolic Planet. To overcome the grueling races, you can't afford to hold back.

name: Trade And Fight
description: Explore, trade with towns and villages, and fight enemies.

name: Parking Expert 2!
description: Get ready to put your parking prowess to the ultimate test and become the ultimate Parking Expert in this thrilling sequel!

name: YeGung
description: This game is a bow action RPG game, so you can advance without developing your character, and you can easily defeat enemies as you strengthen your character. Features include main quests, daily quests, field hunting grounds, reinforcement, and stores.

name: Welcome Home
description: Welcome Home is a bone-chilling horror walking simulator that plunges you into a world of terror and intrigue. Set in a decrepit and sinister house that you have just purchased, this game will test your courage as you navigate through the eerie halls of your new home.

name: Garden of Táozi
description: In this stylized, 3D sliding block puzzle adventure, play as a cute version of Sun Wukong as he goes on a quest to collect the legendary Golden Peach of Healing! Push blocks and collect peaches to progress forward!

name: Trio Tactics TD
description: Dive into our exciting Tower Defense game! Choose from three unique towers and utilize specialized skill trees and powerful abilities. Develop your strategy, defeat various enemies, and become the ultimate defense strategist!

name: WraithRun
description: WraithRun is a cyberpunk-themed classic arcade-style game in first person. Escape the maze by collecting all the orbs, but avoid the deadly wraiths.

name: Room Renovator: Furniture Decor Simulator
description: Become a real interior designer and show your creativity in the kitchen in the new room decor simulator!

name: Boat Driver: Ship Parking Simulator
description: An exciting and realistic boat parking simulator! Boat parking is not an easy task, it is a real test of precision!

name: Cape's Escape Game: 9th Room
description: Escape game with cute but quirky characters

name: The Hole Town
description: To the town in the hole... a story about a place where I can't go.

name: Trial Traction
description: Jump onto your cross bike and drive along a trail filled with many obstacles and humps to overcome!

name: Z-Ape: Tower Defense
description: Z-Ape is a unique tower defense and first person shooter mash up game. Hordes of enemies attacking your base, it's up to you to stop them by placing towers or fighting them on FPS mode with guns, or both!

name: Planetarian: The Reverie of a Little Planet & Snow Globe
description: Visual novel studio Key's sci-fi tale "planetarian: The Reverie of a Little Planet" and its prequel "planetarian: Snow Globe" now available as a single package!

name: My Girlfriend is... Centaur
description: Step into an extraordinary romance despite physiological disparities. Can you navigate a relationship with a centaur girl and overcome the challenges together?

name: Infinite Innocence
description: Infinite Innocence is a game about finding anomalies, but it is very easy to see them with lighting. What if we give it a little more difficulty and tension? Will you be able to remember everything until the end?

name: Pyramid Runner
description: This arcade puzzle game challenges you to collect treasures from ancient pyramids, dark dungeons, and even Mars. You'll have to outsmart cruel mummies and dangerous gorillas, as well as solve many of clever puzzles.

name: Gothic Classic Khorinis Saga
description: A collection of Gothic Classic and Gothic II Complete Classic for Nintendo Switch.

name: Fortress Challenge: Fort Boyard
description:
Sir Fouras has taken the adventure at Fort Boyard to the next level. With his 6 exclusive perks, one for each part, he will shake up the rules of the game. Upon your arrival at the Fort, select the perk of the evening, while Father Fouras guides you through his mysterious riddles.

This new edition also offers 10 brand new trials, including Tug of War, Pirate Planks, the Bank, the Garage, and many more.

Get ready to experience epic challenges and push your limits!

name: Luminous Skies: Interstellar
description: Embark on a journey through the stars in a turn based sci-fi RPG. Switch between two clone soldiers and two robust classes. Gather resources and make food out of it. Search for rare weapons and armor through the universe. Build up your friendships with the crew. Play fun mini games.

name: NeoSprint
description: The exhilarating Atari racing classic “Sprint” series returns! NeoSprint zooms back to life as a single screen arcade racer for up to 8 players, paired with a robust track builder and intuitive sharing tools, ensuring a racing experience that satisfies speed demons and architects alike.

name: King Island 3
description: Embark on the final chapter of the King Island Franchise and venture into new depths, discover the Lost City and encounter Lola the Enchantress, you are no longer alone, Kaptivo!

name: Wuxia: Founding Schools
description: "Wuxia: Founding Schools" is a Chinese-style martial arts card game. Players can create sects, train heroes, build decks, and create unique cards and styles using different effects. It's all about drawing and playing cards!

name: Polyoshapes
description: Polyoshapes is a captivating puzzle game where players engage in the strategic placement of various geometric shapes on a grid.

name: Iwakura Aria
description: The Iwakura mansion holds a dark secret. Ichiko the new young maid joins looking for nothing but safety and security, but would soon find herself entangled with the beautiful daughter of the Iwakura household. Unravel the secrets of the Iwakura mansion in this gripping suspense visual novel.

name: The Backrooms: Unseen Tapes
description: "The Backrooms: Unseen Tapes" is a first-person survival horror game where you navigate a maze-like, ever-changing procedurally generated environment. With stealth, speed, and strategy, evade monsters and conserve limited resources to maintain your sanity and escape this nightmarish dimension.

name: Oh Deer
description: One Hunter, and up to four more friends disguised as deer. In this thrilling game of hide-and-seek where every move could be the last. Will you blend in with the herd or stand out? Oh Deer...

name: Love Is All Around: Love In The Room
description: Love Is All Around-Love In The Room is a full first-person perspective, immersive is a relationship experience 3DVR work, the whole process is shot in first-person perspective, fully immersed in the scene interaction and real-life simulation.

name: Mechanical Siege
description: Time control looking down Angle shot through the game

name: Demons are coming!
description: Demons are coming! is a bullet hell rougelite shooter where you fight a high variety of demons that occupied your holy land. Use the upgrades you find to your advantage and create your ideal guns to help you kill the most terrifying monsters.

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition includes:
• SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories
• Deluxe Outing Pack
- Thrilling Outfit Pack
- Excited Outfit Pack
- Anya's Bond Dress and Bond Hat
• Deluxe Edition Bonus: Anya's Director Chimera Hat

name: Scroll the Pain Away
description: Step into the shoes of Indigo, the owner of a small magic shop. Help your customers with a wide variety of problems!

name: Cubicatch
description: Cubicatch is a puzzle game where you navigate a mind-bending world as a cube, shifting between 2D and 3D, and use the properties of different blocks to solve intricate puzzles! Discover and master different mechanics in this unique and challenging puzzle game.

name: Hi On Rhythm
description: A rhythm game? A bullet-hell? Is there a way to have it all? Then let us get Hi on the Rhythm!!

name: Conge's Crunch Time
description: Take over the kingdom through programming. An octopus named Queue and a toad named Stack will be with you. As long as you give them the right instructions.

name: Manhattan Dolls
description: "Manhattan Dolls" is a point-and-click adventure game with RPG and dating sim elements. Play as either a lesbian woman or as a straight man and romance your way around The Big Apple. Meet beautiful women and see what crazy adventures lie in store for you on this epic night about town!

name: Mystery of Dust
description: A sudden mechanical rebellion. An ordinary girl who has gained power. Faced with a "world-class" crisis. Is there a secret behind the rebellion? Is the power gained safe? Can a few people's journey save the world? Find out in the tower defense RPG, Mystery of the Dust!

name: Flying Tank
description: Get into your Flying Tank and shoot 'em up like it's the good old days! Kill strange bosses, drop bombs from above and build an arsenal of fun, powerful weapons. Reclaim the stolen Earth - alone or with a friend - in a rich action-packed side-scrolling shmup!

name: Luigi's Mansion 2 HD
description:
A remaster of the 3DS game for Nintendo Switch.

Luigi's Mansion: Dark Moon gives players multiple mansions to explore, a variety of puzzles to solve and new ghosts to capture. Armed with the Poltergust 5000, a ghost-sucking, vacuum-like invention, Luigi must complete a number of missions assigned to him by Professor E. Gadd.

Shining a light on the ghosts is no longer enough to stun them into immobility. Players need to activate a new strobe function to stun the ghosts before sucking them up with the Poltergust 5000.

Every mansion is filled with unique puzzle elements and ghosts. Players must figure out how to defeat each one of them and find hidden clues and keys to unlock new areas.

name: Quack Invasion
description: Pilot mechs as you slaughter hordes of a diverse cast of alien ducks. Build your arsenal from a variety of mechs, weapons and items to survive in ever-changing scenarios.

name: Lizard Quest!
description: Crawl into the ultimate co-op RPG lizard simulator, set in a variety of lush environments ranging from beautiful jungle rainforests to harsh dry savannahs. Grow your lizard to incredible sizes while honing your platforming skills to become the ultimate lizard!

name: The Alpha Wolf
description: The Alpha Wolf is an RPG animal simulator game. Play as a wolf in this open world environment. Hunt and kill animals, gather your own wolf pack, upgrade their skills and become stronger. Unlock magic skills to hunt stronger animals, to fight bosses or other players in PVP Arena Battles.

name: Battle Crush
description: The beginning of an explosive action brawl! Battle Crush is an action-packed game with simple controls and intense battles. Smash your enemies with spectacular skills in this electrifying arena filled with explosive energy!

name: A Day Out
description: A Day Out is a monster-hunting, paranormal-investigating, and case-solving co-op shooter game. Unlock gadgets and upgrade your base as you discover a new supernatural world with your friends!

name: Polity
description: Polity is a casual cross-platform MMORPG set in a dynamic, player-driven world. Players have the opportunity to govern colonies, join other colonies, explore the world, uncover the lore or master diverse skills such as farming, forestry, fishing etc. With a wide variety of features such as quests, achievements, puzzles, mini-games, and crafting, along with extensive customization options, Polity encourages players to forge their own path and create their own unique journey within its expansive virtual realm.

name: Warchief
description: Warchief combines the best of MOBA and strategy games with unmatched simplicity. Choose your hero, recruit and customize your armies, explore the jungle, and seize strategic objectives to become the ultimate Warchief. Ready to dominate the battlefield?

name: Legacy
description:
With the tokenization of in-game property becoming more popular all the time in the web3 world, Legacy is here to put a unique spin on NFT ownership.

Legacy is a game about entrepreneurial success, about building an enterprise from the ground up by designing and selling products. Through the game’s Design Competitions, you can compete against other players all over the world to design the most creative products around and sell them with the greatest efficiency.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2: Additional Puzzle Pack Set Vol.5
description: Sin descripción

name: Alister Alt Costume
description: Use this cute costume on a new game and enjoy the fanciness of looking cute in a surreal wonderland at the same time! Enjoy the brightly colored costume and love ali in all his cuteness!

name: WWE 2K24: Post Malone & Friends Pack
description: Take down the competition with the Post Malone & Friends Pack, featuring the 9-time Diamond-certified artist and a host of notable WWE Superstars and Legends. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION card. This pack is included with the WWE 2K24 Season Pass.

name: Cyber Clutch: Hot Import Nights - Overdrive Pack
description: Embrace the future of racing with the 'Hot Import Nights: Cyber Clutch - Overdrive Edition. This exclusive package features two unique car models - the agile Wasp and the sleek Scythe. Each comes with 12 distinctive holographic customization items, available only in this edition.

name: The Mobius: Apartment
description: In a eerie apartment, explore and discover anomalies, find the rules,seeking the correct Floor and Exit of The Mobius Apartment.

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Wastelands Set
description: Prepare for the ultimate survival experience with the Wastelands Set DLC! In this set, you'll find: Wastelands Dual Anger, Wastelands Brutal Thinner, Wastelands Fatal Melter.

name: Land of the Vikings: Thralls
description: This new content adds a new strategic layer, with thrall management! Capture defeated enemies as thralls and assign them tasks to boost your settlement's efficiency. Keep your thralls happy and healthy, and witness their stories unfold.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Lucky Dragon
description: The 11th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings the Mulan Realm to the game (inspired by 1998's Mulan), the new characters Mulan and Mushu, the Majesty and Magnolias Star Path, a new event called Memory Mania and a new feature of cooking delivery daily quests by Remy.

name: Fingun Forever!
description: In a horrible tragedy, Casino Karen and her army of giant anime waifus have kidnapped your girlfriend. Pilot Fingun once again and save the day!

name: Entombed
description: You wake up in the middle of the night. The lights are all off and something feels off. You grab your flashlight and try to figure out the source of this anomaly. However, you grow hungry and head to the kitchen where things start to go horribly wrong.

name: Glow Up 2
description: Glow up the characters for each of the 9 stages, Units are divided into red and blue teams for auto-battle. Click to predict the winning team. If you guess right, you will be able to see the whole of the characters that have been Glow up.

name: XGA
description: This is a Metroidvania aiming to continue Metroid Fusion's focus on horror and the SA-X. Explore a huge, interconnected space station, fighting various monsters, upgrades and boss battles. Avoid XGA as getting caught means certain death....

name: Add Town
description: sliding puzzle game

name: I Am Security
description: Step into the shoes of a club security guard in "I Am Security," where your job is to keep the club safe and ensure only the right guests get inside. As a security guard, you’ll face a variety of challenges that will test your observation and decision-making skills.

name: Idle Champions: Alvina the Tressym Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Alvina the Tressym Familiar 4 Epic Potions of Speed 4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 1 Potion of Polish
